title: Diamond-Studded Gold Bangles - Kadiyam Collection
materials: 18K Yellow Gold with Diamond Accents. Each bangle is meticulously crafted from high-quality 18-karat yellow gold known for its radiant color and lasting durability. The diamonds are hand-selected for their brilliance and clarity
showcasing a stunning sparkle. Hallmarked for authenticity and gold purity.
features: These modern bangles feature a sleek and minimalist design. Geometric diamond settings are precisely spaced along the bangle to create a captivating sparkle. The diamonds are set in a prong setting that enhances their brilliance. Simple yet elegant design makes them suitable for any modern style.
occasions: Engagement Parties. These bangles can be worn for casual outings
or even paired with traditional attire for a contemporary twist on classic elegance.
description: A contemporary take on traditional Indian bangle designs. Showcases the perfect blend of modern aesthetics and timeless elegance. Crafted with high-quality materials and exceptional attention to detail, these bangles are built to last a lifetime. The diamond accents add a touch of luxury and sophistication, making them a valuable addition to any jewelry collection.
